entry.value: select distinct REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''),' ','_') as swidtag, product_name as name, product_editor as editor, product_version as version, '' as category, '' as IsOptionOf from FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> ''

SELECT distinct REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''),' ','_') as swidtag, CASE WHEN vm_hostname IS NOT NULL THEN lower(zone||'_'||vm_hostname) ELSE lower(zone||'_'||server_hostname) END as equipment_id, '' as allocated_metric, '' as allocated_users, '0' as nbusers FROM FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_version IS NOT NULL AND server_hostname IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> '' AND server_hostname <> ''

SELECT distinct lower(zone||'_'||vm_hostname) as zone_vmhostname, lower(vm_hostname) as vm_hostname, vcpu as vcpu, lower(type) as type, lower(zone||'_'||server_hostname) as parentid FROM FLOWFILE WHERE zone IS NOT NULL AND vm_hostname IS NOT NULL AND server_hostname IS NOT NULL AND zone <> '' AND vm_hostname <> '' AND server_hostname <> ''
SELECT distinct lower(zone) as zone, lower(environment) as environment FROM FLOWFILE WHERE zone IS NOT NULL AND zone <> ''

SELECT distinct lower(zone||'_'||server_hostname) as zone_serverhostname, lower(type) as type, lower(module_name) as module_name, lower(server_hostname) as server_hostname, lower(zone) as parentid, lower(raw_capacity) as raw_capacity FROM FLOWFILE WHERE (zone IS NOT NULL AND server_hostname IS NOT NULL And vm_hostname IS NULL AND zone <> '' AND server_hostname <> '') OR (zone IS NOT NULL AND server_hostname IS NOT NULL And vm_hostname = '' AND zone <> '' AND server_hostname <> '')

select distinct REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''),' ','_') as swidtag, sku as sku, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, product_version as product_version, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, licenses_under_maintenance as maintenance_licenses, avg_unit_price as unit_price, avg_maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, "maintenance_start" as maintenance_start, "maintenance_end" as maintenance_end, (avg_unit_price * acquired_licenses) as total_license_cost, COALESCE(avg_maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(licenses_under_maintenance,0) as total_maintenance_cost, (COALESCE(avg_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(acquired_licenses,0)) + (COALESCE(avg_maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(licenses_under_maintenance,0)) as total_cost from FLOWFILE WHERE sku IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_version IS NOT NULL AND metric IS NOT NULL AND acquired_licenses IS NOT NULL AND avg_unit_price IS NOT NULL AND sku <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> '' AND metric <> '' AND acquired_licenses <> '' AND avg_unit_price <> ''

SELECT distinct id as id, CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_'), '-','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_'), '-','_') END as swidtag, lower(host_id) as equipment_id, allocated_metric as allocated_metric, allocated_users as allocated_users FROM FLOWFILE WHERE host_id IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND host_id <> ''

SELECT distinct lower(coalesce(application_instance_name,coalesce(application_id,application_name))) as Instance_id, CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') END as swidtag FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> ''

select distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, lower(application_name) as name, environment as environment, lower(domain) as domain from FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> ''
select distinct lower("vm_id") as vm_id, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE vm_id IS NULL OR server_id IS NULL OR vm_id = '' OR server_id = ''

SELECT distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_'), '-','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_'), '-','_') END as swidtag FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> ''
select distinct lower("cluster_name") as cluster_name, lower("vcenter_name") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE cluster_name IS NOT NULL AND cluster_name <> ''

select distinct lower("vm_id") as vm_id, lower("vm_name") as vm_name, vcpu as vcpu, lower(environment) as environment, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE vm_id IS NOT NULL AND server_id IS NOT NULL AND vm_id <> '' AND server_id <> ''
select distinct lower("vcenter_name") as vcenter_name, lower("vcenter_version") as vcenter_version from FLOWFILE WHERE vcenter_name IS NOT NULL AND vcenter_name <> ''

select distinct sku as sku, CSC as corporate_sourcing_contract, ordering_date as ordering_date, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, TRIM(product_version) as product_version, software_provider as software_provider, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, maintenance_licences as maintenance_licenses, unit_price as unit_price, maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, maintenance_provider as maintenance_provider, maintenance_start as maintenance_start, maintenance_end as maintenance_end, last_PO as last_purchased_order, support_number as support_number from FLOWFILE WHERE sku IS NULL OR product_name IS NULL OR product_editor IS NULL OR metric IS NULL OR acquired_licenses IS NULL OR sku = '' OR product_name = '' OR product_editor = '' OR metric = '' OR acquired_licenses = ''

select distinct lower(server_id) as server_id, lower(server_name) as server_name, lower(server_type) as server_type, lower(server_os) as server_os, lower(cpu_model) as cpu_model, cpu_manufacturer as cpu_manufacturer, cores_per_processor as cores_per_processor, oracle_core_factor as oracle_core_factor, ibm_pvu as ibm_pvu, sag_uvu as sag_uvu, server_processors_numbers as server_processors_numbers, lower(hyperthreading) as hyperthreading, lower(datacenter_name) as datacenter_name, lower(environment) as environment, lower(cluster_name) as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE server_id <> '' AND cpu_model <> '' AND cores_per_processor <> '' AND cpu_manufacturer <> '' AND server_processors_numbers <> '' AND server_id IS NOT NULL AND cpu_model IS NOT NULL AND cores_per_processor IS NOT NULL AND cpu_manufacturer IS NOT NULL AND server_processors_numbers IS NOT NULL

select distinct product_name as name, product_editor as editor, product_version as version, lower(host_id) as equipment_id from FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NULL OR product_editor IS NULL OR host_id IS NULL OR product_name = '' OR product_editor = '' OR host_id = ''

select distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, lower(application_name) as name, environment as environment, lower(domain) as domain from FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NULL AND application_name = ''

SELECT distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, lower(host_id) as Equipment_id FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND host_id IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> '' AND host_id <> ''

select distinct CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_'), '-','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_'), '-','_') END as swidtag, sku as sku, CSC as corporate_sourcing_contract, ordering_date as ordering_date, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, COALESCE(TRIM(product_version),'') as product_version, software_provider as software_provider, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, maintenance_licences as maintenance_licenses, unit_price as unit_price, maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, maintenance_provider as maintenance_provider, maintenance_start as maintenance_start, maintenance_end as maintenance_end, last_PO as last_purchased_order, support_number as support_number, unit_price * acquired_licenses as total_license_cost, COALESCE(maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(maintenance_licences,0) as total_maintenance_cost, COALESCE(unit_price,0) * COALESCE(acquired_licenses,0) + COALESCE(maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(maintenance_licences,0) as total_cost from FLOWFILE WHERE sku <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND metric <> '' AND acquired_licenses <> ''

select distinct CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_'), '-','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_'), '-','_') END as swidtag, product_name as name, product_editor as editor, product_version as version from FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> ''
select distinct lower("desktop_name") as desktop_name from FLOWFILE

select distinct lower(server_id) as server_id, lower(server_type) as server_type, lower(server_os) as server_os, lower(cpu_model) as cpu_model, cpu_manufacturer as cpu_manufacturer, cores_per_processor as cores_per_processor, oracle_core_factor as oracle_core_factor, ibm_pvu as ibm_pvu, sag_uvu as sag_uvu, server_processors_numbers as server_processors_numbers, lower(hyperthreading) as hyperthreading, lower(datacenter_name) as datacenter_name, lower(cluster_name) as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE server_id = '' OR cpu_model = '' OR cores_per_processor = '' OR cpu_manufacturer = '' OR server_processors_numbers = '' OR server_id IS NULL OR cpu_model IS NULL OR cores_per_processor IS NULL OR cpu_manufacturer IS NULL OR server_processors_numbers IS NULL

processors.name: Store Original File Name and ID

entry.value: SELECT distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, lower(coalesce(application_instance_name,coalesce(application_id,application_name))) as Instance_id, environment as environment FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> ''
SELECT * from FLOWFILE Order By id
